title: How much influence do authors have on the titles of their books? - Quora

response.answer_text: From what I gather, while the author has some influence, the publisher can insist or refuse to publish otherwise. In addition if published in another country, US to UK and vice versa for instance, the publisher might change the title without consultation, sometimes for copyright reasons. Those who self publish or publish with indie publishers usually have full control.
Usually the title is up to them. Occasionally a publisher will urge a change or insist on a different one for a different market. But usually the author has the choice.
